span.strong:
ALL SCHOOLS ARE CLOSED FOR THE
REMAINDER OF THE SCHOOL YEAR.

div.h4: Daily Plans for Remote Learning – March 30 – April 3
Daily Plans for Remote Learning – April 6 – April 9
Daily Plans for Remote Learning – April 14 – April 17
Daily Plans for Remote Learning – April 20 – April 24

div.div: It is the mission of Forest Ridge School District 142 to maximize the unlimited academic and behavioral potential of each student in a caring, but demanding, child-centered learning community.

div.p: The Oak Forest Fire Department in conjunction with Forest Ridge School District 142 will be conducting training at 15000 Laramie

div.div: Fertilizer and weed killer will be applied at each of the four schools on Thursday, April 2, 2020.

img.alt: To DO or To BE? — Now, THAT is the Question!

h3.a: To DO or To BE? — Now, THAT is the Question!

p.strong: We all have so many things to get done in a day. We utilize terms like “multitasking” to
I came across a quote the other day that really caught my attention. I did not see a
